attributes.action: Grants/Funding for Small to Medium Manufacturing Business
attributes.additional_details: If we do not get the grant and rate funding as given to retail, hospitality and leisure sector then the Chancellor and Prime Ministers promise to put their arms around British Businesses will be broken.
attributes.background: We want the Government to recognise that by ordering the closure of Retail, Hospitality & Leisure Sector they have left out British Companies whose manufacturing is solely for these sectors.  . We call upon all manufactures and their staff to sign this petition to make the Goverment support us all.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Given the current situation suspend all Business Rates now to all business: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305899

Extend grants immediately to small businesses outside of SBRR: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305024

Raise the (SBBR) small business COVID-19 grant to £25,000 help small businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307846

Stop business rates, VAT and PAYE whilst government advise isolation for COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304260

Support small manufacturers through COVID-19 with loans and business rate relief: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304778

Make Business Rates for the UK Manufacturing Industry free for 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311080
